mapper.insert: insert into meeting( category_id, meeting_name, meeting_description, meeting_date, meeting_place, current_people, meeting_people, meeting_image, created_by, created_date, updated_date) values ( #{categoryId}, #{meetingName}, #{meetingDescription}, #{meetingDate}, #{meetingPlace}, 0, #{recruitPeopleNum}, #{meetingBanner}, #{meetingAdmin}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select category_id as categoryId, meeting_name as meetingName, meeting_description as meetingDescription, meeting_date as meetingDate, meeting_place as meetingPlace, current_people as currentPeople, meeting_people as meetingPeople, meeting_image as meetingImage, created_by as createdBy from meeting
